column5: there was a petition around last spring but this is a new one, I've e-mailed to see what happened to the other one but thought I'd post this any way, seems like they keep cutting their budget, time to e-mail the Minister of Natural Resources,  and our MPP's maybe  [email protected]  [email protected]  http://www.ipetitions.com/petition/savethemnr2007/ Thanx Richard spinnerbaitking
